name: RWBY: Crystal Match
description:
Play with your favorite RWBY characters in competitive match-3 puzzles. Solve challenging and uniquely designed puzzles by unleashing your Semblance, breaking dust in succession to create flashy combos, and blasting various parts of the board with intellect and a hint of luck. Head to battle with customizable outfits containing special abilities and characteristics to help you in battle.

Competitive Match-3 Gameplay
- Match the same-colored blocks to solve puzzles
- Match 4 to 5 in unique shapes to blast gems and create stunning combos

Customizable Outfits
- Equip outfits each with their own unique abilities for your favorite RWBY characters
- Upgrade your outfits to strengthen your abilities

Settle Your Differences
- Top the leaderboards to earn impressive rewards and bragging rights
